meanings.definition: Made a rough drawing or outline of something.
meanings.sent1: She sketched a simple flower on the paper.
meanings.sent2: He sketched the outline of a house in his notebook.
meanings.sent3: The child sketched a funny face with big ears.
meanings.sent4: Her words sketched a picture of a peaceful meadow in my mind.
meanings.sent5: The artist sketched the scene with incredible detail.

meanings.definition: Provided a brief description or account of something.
meanings.sent1: He sketched the main points of the story for his friend.
meanings.sent2: She sketched the events of the day in her diary.
meanings.sent3: The teacher sketched a quick summary of the lesson on the board.
meanings.sent4: His words sketched a vivid picture of the bustling city.
meanings.sent5: The journalist sketched the breaking news in a concise article.

meanings.definition: Created a preliminary plan or idea.
meanings.sent1: They sketched out a rough plan for the project.
meanings.sent2: She sketched a basic outline of her novel before writing.
meanings.sent3: The team sketched a quick idea for the upcoming event.
meanings.sent4: His vision sketched a future where technology thrived.
meanings.sent5: The architect sketched a brilliant design for the new building.
